meanings.definition: A person who is in charge of or performs a specific task or service.
meanings.sent1: The shop wallahs were busy restocking shelves.
meanings.sent2: The wallahs at the event ensured everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The wallahs organizing the party forgot the cake!
meanings.sent4: She was the wallahs of creativity in the team.
meanings.sent5: The wallahs of the kitchen, he cooked with precision and flair.

meanings.definition: Used to express surprise or excitement.
meanings.sent1: Wallahs! I can't believe you did that!
meanings.sent2: Wallahs, that was an amazing performance!
meanings.sent3: Wallahs, you scared me with that prank!
meanings.sent4: Her painting was wallahs, a burst of colors on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: Wallahs! The fireworks lit up the night sky beautifully.
